TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CallExternalMethodActivity extends System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity implements class System.Workflow.ComponentModel.IDynamicPropertyTypeProvider
Public Class CallExternalMethodActivity Inherits Activity Implements IDynamicPropertyTypeProvider

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

summary.span: 定義工作流程通訊活動，用於呼叫本機服務上的方法。

span.span: Defines a workflow communication activity that is used to call a method on a local service.

summary.span: 這個活動用於透過本機服務將資料從工作流程傳送到主機。

span.span: This activity is used to send data from the workflow to the host through the local service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 本機服務是一種類別，可實作本機服務介面 (標示有 的介面)，並會加入到 。A local service is a class that implements a local service interface (an interface that is marked with ) and is added to the . > [!NOTE] > 呼叫外部方法時，會複製該方法的所有參數。When the external method is called all parameters of the method are cloned. 如果參數型別實作 ，則會呼叫 `Clone` 方法，否則會以 來序列化或還原序列化這些參數。If the parameter types implement the `Clone` method is called or they are serialized and deserialized with a . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示如何在自訂活動中使用 呼叫外部方法。The following code example shows how to use the in a custom activity to call an external method. 這個程式碼範例是 PurchaseOrderWorkflow.Designer.cs 檔案中＜接聽 SDK＞範例的一部分。This code example is part of the Listen SDK sample from the PurchaseOrderWorkflow.Designer.cs file. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[接聽範例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1cec0e82-7544-429f-b717-0fc25eb42b7f)。For more information, see [Listen Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1cec0e82-7544-429f-b717-0fc25eb42b7f). [!code-csharp[wf_samples#213](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets19.cs#213)] [!code-vb[wf_samples#213](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets19.vb#213)]

summary.span: 取得或設定外部方法的 。

span.span: Gets or sets the for the external method.

value.span: 外部方法的相互關聯權杖。

span.span: The correlation token for the external method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性定義指定的外部方法呼叫來自哪一個特定的 活動。This property defines which specific activity a given external method call comes from. 這個值可用於本機通訊服務事件的承載，將事件導向至正確的 活動。This value can then be used in the payload of a local communication service event to direct that event to the correct activity. 如需相互關聯的範例，請參閱[相互關聯本機服務範例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5a3d0733-bbea-4dbf-88ee-a8316db55fbd)。For an example of correlation, see the [Correlated Local Service Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5a3d0733-bbea-4dbf-88ee-a8316db55fbd). ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何存取 `CorrelationToken` 物件的 `CallExternalMethodActivity` 屬性。The following sample shows how to access the `CorrelationToken` property of a `CallExternalMethodActivity` object. 這個範例來自 CorrelatedLocalServiceWorkflow.designer.cs 檔案中的＜相互關聯本機服務 SDK＞範例。This sample is from the Correlated Local Service SDK sample, from the CorrelatedLocalServiceWorkflow.designer.cs file. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[相互關聯本機服務範例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5a3d0733-bbea-4dbf-88ee-a8316db55fbd)。For more information, see [Correlated Local Service Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5a3d0733-bbea-4dbf-88ee-a8316db55fbd). [!code-csharp[wf_samples#200](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets19.cs#200)] [!code-vb[wf_samples#200](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets19.vb#200)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件會定義事件委派，在活動叫用本機服務上的外部方法之前會先執行這個委派。The event defines an event delegate that is executed before the activity invokes the external method on the local service. [!INCLUDE[DependencyPropertyRemark](~/includes/dependencypropertyremark-md.md)]

returns.span: 代表屬性存取層級的 列舉值。

span.span: An enumeration value that denotes the access level of the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在編譯時期用來驗證屬性之間是否正確繫結。Used at compile time to validate whether the properties are correctly bound to one another. 如果沒有這個介面，會直接從屬性 getter/setter 推斷這項資訊。Without this interface this information is inferred directly from property getter/setters.
